newsitem.title: USA: Adobe /Nova settle, other claims pending.
newsitem.headline: Adobe /Nova settle, other claims pending.

text.p: Adobe Systems Inc said it settled its lawsuit against Nova Development Corp alleging Nova's distribution of its 1500 Font Mega Pack product infringed registered copyrights owned by Adobe.
Nova licensed the product from another developer.
Under the settlement, Nova will discontinue marketing the 1500 Font Mega Pack and will pay an undisclosed sum to Adobe.
Nova will also seek to avoid purchasing from type vendors font software created through unauthorized copying of font software from Adobe or any other font software publisher.
Adobe's claims against the two other defendants to the lawsuit, Softkey International Inc and Southern Software Inc are still pending and are set for trial in 1997.
